flavorText: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie ist im Einklang mit der Essenz ihres Meisters.

foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.

foreignData.flavorText: Está en armonía con la esencia de su amo.

foreignData.text:

Sacrificar la Esfera del comandante: Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle s'harmonise avec l'essence de son maître.

Sacrifiez la Sphère du commandant : Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Si accorda all'essenza del suo signore.

Sacrifica la Sfera del Comandante: Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 它能与主人的精华同调。
foreignData.name: 指挥官法球
foreignData.text:
{T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
牺牲指挥官法球：抓一张牌。

name: Commander's Sphere
originalText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

rulings.text: If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Commander's Sphere's first ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.
If you don't have a commander, Commander's Sphere's first ability produces no mana.

text:
